text: Sir, can you tell me what happened here?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I... I don't know. One minute I was walking, and the next, I was on the ground.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Did you see anyone, or anything, before you fell?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: No, it all happened so fast. I think I tripped.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Are you injured, sir? Can I call for medical assistance?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: My ankle hurts. I think I twisted it. Maybe just a sprain.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Let me take a look. Can you move your toes?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Yeah, I can move them. It just hurts when I try to put weight on it.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Alright. I'm going to call for an ambulance, just to be safe. We need to make sure there are no fractures.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: No, really, it's fine. I can get a ride home. I don't want to go to the hospital.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Sir, I understand, but it's better to be safe than sorry. We need to rule out anything serious.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Fine. But this is going to be a huge bill.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: We'll take care of the details later, sir. Right now, let's focus on getting you some help.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
